meaningMnemonic: The <radical>king</radical> has a <radical>hat</radical> that's made from a <radical>tree</radical> but the more you look at it, the more it looks like it's just a big <kanji>cork</kanji>. It's a big, wooden <kanji>plug</kanji> that he's just placed on his head. It can hardly be called a hat.
readingMnemonic: It turned out this <kanji>cork</kanji> hat was given to him by a <reading>cen</reading>taur (せん). You look into it and it turned out it IS a really big cork that centaurs use on their big wine casks. But the king didn't understand, and thought it was a hat. The centaurs are probably still laughing.
